loans.name: Chantha

texts.en:
Chantha, a 28-year-old married mother of one, resides in Takeo Province, Cambodia where she has been working in a factory for more than three years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband, shown with her in the photo, is a farmer who earns $2 each day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Chantha is requesting a loan of $1300 to purchase cattle to produce calves to sell, which will enhance the family's income. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to produce calves to sell

loans.name: Men

texts.en:
Men is 46 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been making axes and knives to sell for more than ten years, earning approximately $7 daily. Her children are garment workers who make an income of $10 each day. 

In order to improve her business, Men is requesting a loan of $1100 to purchase a cutting machine to use in the business. This purchase will help her save much in her work process. In the future, she would like to expand the business and improve her house.

loans.use: to purchase a cutting machine to use in the business

loans.name: Nap

texts.en:
Nap is 45 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in weaving for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a rice farmer who makes an income of $2 per day. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $6 each day. 

In order to improve her business, Nap is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase silk to use for weaving. By doing so, she would obtain enough ability to produce more cloth to sell and earn more income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn Bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase silk to use for weaving

loans.name: Nak

texts.en:
Nak is 34 years old. He is married and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been working as a construction worker for more than a year, earning approximately $8 per day. His wife is employed in a factory. She makes an income of $5 daily. 

Due to the difficulty in his family’s transportation, Nak is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help him save some money on his transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, he would like to run an additional business and help his children earn a higher education.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Franklin Evaristo

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Madres Unidas.

En este lugar vive el señor Franklin, tiene 43 años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa de sus padres. Lleva cinco años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan en la institución para salir adelante.

Don Franklin es un hombre muy trabajador que sale adelante gracias a lo que él sabe hacer, trabaja en el negocio familiar que es un taller de  ebanistería y una mueblería lugar en el cual venden sus obras, ellos elaboran camas, mueble de toda clase y todo lo que se pueda realizar con la madera, venden en su local y también  entregan en otras ciudades donde venden  a muy buen precio. Llevan más de 50 años  en el negocio el cual viene de generación en generación.

Este crédito es para comprar madera, pinturas, clavos y otros materiales de carpintería que ellos emplean para elaborar sus obras. 

Su sueño es tener una mueblería en Manta.
texts.en:
In Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its great diversity in traditional products (e.g. straw hats known both throughout Ecuador and abroad), the members of the Banco Comunal Madres Unidas (communal bank) meet every two weeks.

Franklin lives in this city. He is 43 years old, single and lives with his parents. He has been a member of the communal bank for five years. He really appreciates the help that this institution has given him in his efforts to get ahead.

Don Franklin is a very hardworking man who is using his knowledge to get ahead in life. He works in his family's woodworking and furniture-making business, where he sells his creations. They make beds, other types of furniture and anything else you can make out of wood. They sell out of their workshop as well as in other cities, where they sell at very good prices. Their business has been around for over 50 years and has been passed down from generation to generation.

This loan will be used to buy wood, paint, nails and other carpentry materials that they need to make their products. 

His dream is to have a furniture store in Manta.

loans.use: to buy wood, paint, nails and other carpentry materials

loans.name: Shoirakhon

texts.ru:
Шоирахон родилась 1979 году в городе Канибадаме. Вышла замуж в раннем возрасте в 16 лет по воле родителей. Сейчас у нее уже четверо детей. Она счастлива. Но растит их и обеспечить не легкая работа. Ее муж зарабатывает  в РФ, и ей одной приходиться  растит своих  детей.  Муж хоть и присылает ей деньги, но их не хватает на жизнь.   Старшая дочка Шоирахон уже довольно взрослая, и ее надо выдавать замуж. Для этого Шоирахон   пришлось работать самой. 
Она сначала начала работать в местном рынке продавцом. Продавала детскую одежду. Постепенно она накопила денег и открыла свой местный магазин не далеко от своего дома.   Шоирахон покупает товар с другого города и продает их по дороже в своем селе.  Вот уже более пяти лет самостоятельно, занимается этим видом бизнеса. Но так как потребность к ее товарам растет, она хочет расширить свой бизнес. Для этого она обратилась   организацию Арванд. Она хочет на полученный кредит закупить новый ассортимент детской одежды.Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и помощь.
texts.en:
Shoirakhon was born in 1979 in the city of Kanibadam.  At her parents' will, she was married at the young age of 16.  She now has four children and she's happy.  But it's not an easy job to raise and provide for her children.  Her husband works abroad in the Russian Federation and she alone has to raise her children.  Her husband at least sends money, but it's not enough for their needs.  Shoirakhon's eldest daughter is already old enough and it's time to give her away in marriage.  Shoirakhon has to earn this money herself.

She started by working at the local market as a sales person selling children's clothes.  Little by little, she saved up enough money and opened her own store not far from her home.  Shoirakhon buys her goods in another city and sells them for a profit in her town.  And so for five years now, she has been independently working in this line of business.  Now, since the demand for her goods has increased, Shoirakhon wants to expand her business.

For this reason, she has applied to MDO Arvand for a loan.  She wants to use the loan to buy a new assortment of children's clothes.  She is thankful in advance to MDO Arvand for its support and help.

loans.use: to purchase of a new range of children's clothes

loans.name: Erdenetsetseg

texts.en:
Erdenetsetseg is a 38-year-old married lady who has two sons and lives in the outer 'ger' district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Both of her sons attend the local high school. Erdenetsetseg supports her family by operating a fruit selling business. With her husband’s special help she operates her business successfully. 

This loan will be used to purchase a variety of fruits. As Erdenetsetseg wants to increase her working capital, she is requesting a loan for 4,000,000 Mongolian tugriks (MNT) to purchase fruit. She says, "From now on, my husband and I must create savings for our sons' higher education fees; therefore, we must increase our income.”

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell and increase her working capital

loans.name: Baasanjargal

texts.en:
Baasanjargal is a 31-year-old married man who lives with his wife, daughter, mother and younger brother in an outer ger district of the city of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia, that lacks basic infrastructure. He works as a director while his mother operates a stall business, his younger brother attends university and his wife cares for their new born baby. 

Now it's the warm season and Baasanjargal plans to work on his house, which really needs some renovation. Thus, he is requesting a 3,000,000 MNT loan to purchase the necessary construction materials.

loans.use: to work on his old house.

loans.name: Batbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Batbayar, a married man who lives with his family in the yard that he bought, is a father of two, a new-born and a son who attends primary school. He is a builder planning to renovate the old house he bought very recently.

Batbayar is requesting a 3.000.000 MNT loan to purchase bricks for his house and to build a car garage, the latter because the winter season in Mongolia is very cold, with temperature going down to -30-33C.

loans.use: to purchase new bricks for his house and build a car garage

loans.name: Davaanyam

texts.en:
Davaanyam is a 31-year-old married man who lives with his wife and daughter. He has been operating a stall business since 2003 and since 2009 he has been operating a candy-, cake- and biscuit-selling business at one of the biggest indoor food markets of the city. 

With his business income he bought an apartment and lives with his family there. 

With this loan he will purchase a variety of goods to sell in order to increase his working capital. So he is requesting a 3,000,000 MNT loan to purchase more products to sell.

loans.use: to purchase more goods and products to sell.

loans.name: Linda Dalila

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Liberación Femenina se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Linda, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 13, 9 y 2 años, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.

Doña Linda con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante en el hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa Americana, vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local y hasta donde llegan sus clientes, ella comprar esta mercadería por pacas las cuales recibe en su ciudad cada vez que necesita o realiza los pedidos, este tipo de mercadería se vende muy rápido ya que son de muy buena calidad y el precio es cómodo. Tiene tres años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y otras prendas. Lleva 3 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó este negocio que le permite ganarse algo por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
The "Liberación Femenina" ["Women's Liberation"] communal bank meets every fifteen days in Puerto López, a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions. Each year, humpback whales arrive to breed here, an event which attracts many tourists at that time of year. 

In this place lives Linda, who is 29 years old. She is married, and from this relationship she has three children, aged 13, 9 and 2. The two older children are in primary and secondary school. Her husband is a merchant. 

With the aim of earning something on her own account and helping her family get ahead, Linda works selling "American clothing" [used clothing]. She sells from her home, where she has a small shop for her customers to visit. She buys this merchandise in bundles, which she receives each time she needs them, or when orders are placed. This type of merchandise sells very quickly, since it is of good quality and the price is affordable. She has dedicated herself to this activity for three years, and it is going very well for her. 

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as pants, blouses, shirts and other garments. She has been in her communal bank for three years, and she likes it because she started her business with the first loan, allowing her to earn something for her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts and other garments to sell.

loans.name: Maxym

texts.ru:
Максиму 23 года, он женат, имеет двое маленьких детей. 

Максим занимается выездной торговлей в палатках. Торгует спортивной одеждой и обувью в Воронцовке, Софиевке, Марганце, Никополе. Занимается этим делом около трех лет

Максим очень трудолюбивый и постоянный человек. Большую часть прибыли он вкладывает обратно в бизнес, так как говорит "расширение моего бизнеса даст мне возможность обеспечивать семью в будущем".  

Максим просит предоставить ему кредит в размере 15,000 гривен на закупку сезонной одежды - футболок, шорт, спрортивных штанов и обуви.

Помимо данного направления Максим хотел бы заняться еще и другим, в частности сельскохозяйстввенным бизнесом.
texts.en:
Maksym is 23 years old, married, and has two small children.  He has a mobile kiosk and travels between Vorontsovka, Sofievka, Margantsa, and Nikopol selling sport clothes and shoes.  He has been in this business for about three years.

Maksym is a very hard working and consistent man.  He reinvests the lion's share of his profits back into his business, because as he says, "expanding my business gives me the opportunity to provide for my family's future."

Maksym is asking to be given a loan of 15,000 hryven for the purchase of seasonal clothes:  t-shirts, shorts, sport pants, and shoes.  

Besides this line of work, Maksym would like to get into a business in agriculture.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal clothing: t-shirts, shorts, foot wear

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en:
Vannak is 31 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling groceries for more than three years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband is a commune clerk who makes an income of $2 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Vannak is requesting a loan of $550 to purchase more groceries to resell. This purchase will help increase her stock and generate more income for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her store and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell.

loans.name: Bayarmaa

texts.en:
Bayarmaa is a 31-year-old widow who lives with her mother and three daughters in the outer ger district of the city. She supports her family by operating an auto repair supply business at a local auto market. Her elder two daughters attend secondary school while her mother babysits for her youngest daughter. 

She usually sells car air-cushions and other car supplies that she imports from Ereen, a border city between Mongolia and China. She is requesting a 3,000,000 MNT loan to purchase more air-cushions and other products to sell. She is a very hardworking and patient lady since she is a widow and the only person who has income in her family.

loans.use: to purchase more car supplies to sell.

loans.name: Sinat

texts.en: Sinat is 40 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in animal husbandry for more than ten years. Specifically, she raises pig and cattle. She makes an income of $2 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $5 per day. Three of her children are garment workers. They earn about $13 each day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Sinat is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase farmland to use for cultivating agricultural crops. This purchase will help her generate additional income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and help her children earn higher education.

loans.use: to purchase farmland to use for cultivating agricultural crops

loans.name: Urankhishig

texts.en:
Urankhishig is a 41-year-old woman and she lives with her family in an apartment. 

She is a porter and she has been working at the Mongolian Railway Station for 13 years. She lives with her son, and her son has graduation this year. Thus she needs to pay her son's last tuition fee and prepare for her son's graduation. Therefore, she is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT loan to pay his tuition fee and prepare a graduation ceremony.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition fee and pay for his graduation ceremony.

loans.name: Dalin

texts.en: Dalin is 25 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. They are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $7 daily. Due to a lack of funds, Dalin is requesting a loan of $500 to pay for an electricity connection. This money will help her obtain the ability to access electricity and improve her daily life. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she wants to rebuild her house to make it bigger and more convenient for the family.

loans.use: to pay for electricity connection

loans.name: Seak

texts.en:
Seak is 50 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling sugarcane juice for more than six years. In addition, she runs the service of shredding coconut meat. She makes an income of $6 daily. Her husband is a motor taxi driver who earns about $3 each day. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $7 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s living conditions, Seak is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase construction materials to fix her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to fix her house.

loans.name: Josefina Del Carmen

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 24 De Noviembre se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Machalilla en el cantón Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos como el Parque Nacional Machalilla el cual ofrece muchos atractivos de los restos de la cultura ancestral, este lugar es muy visitado en toda época del año.
  
Aquí vive la señora Josefina, tiene 38 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una niña de 11 años que estudia en colegio. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
 
Doña Josefina es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta ganar algo por su cuenta es por eso que trabaja en un local donde vende deliciosos ceviches de pescado, allí ella recibe un pago semanal por su trabajo. Ella realiza el crédito para que su esposo lo utilice en sus faenas de pesca, él se embarca junto a otra persona en su embarcación y se van alta mar por varios días,  luego regresan a las playas del lugar a vender el producto que hayan traído.

Este crédito es para comprar materiales de pesca como piolas, redes, carnadas y víveres para esos días de pesca. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta por con los créditos pueden ayudar en algo a sobrellevar la dura carga del hogar.
 
Su sueño es comprar un barco más grande.
texts.en:
The 24 de Noviembre communal bank meets every fortnight in the Machalilla parish in the Puerto López,canton, an area surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions such as the Machalilla national park which has a lot of attractions in the form of remains of ancestral cultures. This area is well frequented throughout the year. 
  
This is where Josefina lives, she is 38 years old and is in a relationship with her common-law husband with whom she has an 11-year-old daughter who is in secondary school. Her husband makes his living fishing.
 
Josefina is a very hardworking woman who likes to earn a bit by herself, which is why she works in a store where she sells delicious dishes of fish ceviche. Through this job, she earns a weekly salary for the work she performs. She is seeking a loan so that her husband can use it for his work in fishing. Her husband boards a boat with another person in his crew and they will be in high seas for several days, when they get back they will go to the beach where they sell the product that they have brought them. 

This loan is to buy fishing materials such as rope, nets, bait and provisions for those days fishing. Josefina is in the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because through the loans, they can help somewhat in easing the heavy household chores.

His dream is to buy a bigger boat.

loans.use: to buy rope, nets, bait and provisions.

loans.name: Sokhon

texts.en:
Sokhon is 65 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling mix cakes for more than three years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is a construction worker. He makes an income of $8 per day. One of her children is an English teacher who makes an income of $4 each day. 

Due to lack of funds, Sokhon is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a laptop for her daughter who studies at the university. This purchase will help her daughter improve her study. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop for her daughter who studies at the university.

loans.name: Bopha

texts.en:
Bopha is 32 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling groceries for more than three years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a motor taxi driver who makes an income of $5 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Bopha is requesting a loan of $900 to purchase more groceries to resell. In addition, a part of this money will be used to fix her house. This money will help her increase her stock and earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell.

loans.name: Klara

texts.ru: Клара работает в государственной налоговой инспекции, где получает небольшой но стабильный доход. Она хочет сделать ремонт в своем доме. Начать считает нужным с ванной комнаты - наклеить кафельную плитку на пол и на стены, отремонтировтаь потолок, купить новый умывальник, пр. Клара просит предоставиьт ей кредит в сумме 8,700 гривен. После ремонта ванной комнаты, Клара планирует продолжить ремонт в других частях дома.
texts.en:
Klara works in the state tax inspection service, where she earns a modest, but stable, income.  She wants to do some home repairs.  She needs to start with the bathroom, where they will install tile on the walls and floor, repair the ceiling, and buy a new sink, etc.  

Klara is requesting a loan of 8,700 hryven.  After repairing the bathroom, Klara plans to continue doing repairs in other parts of her home.

loans.use: to remodel her bathroom

loans.name: Da

texts.en:
Da is 50 years old. She is married and resides with nine children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than four years, earning approximately 3 USD daily. Da's husband is a motor taxi driver who makes an income of 5 USD each day. Two of her children are employed in garment factory. They earn about 6 USD per day. 

In order to improve her business, Da is requesting a 1,500 USD loan to purchase vegetables, chicken, duck and fish to sell. Expanding her inventory will generate more income to support her family. In the future, Da would like to purchase a store in the market to store her inventory. She would also like to help her children earn bachelors degrees and she plans to build a new bigger house.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, chicken, duck and fish to sell

loans.name: Justina Elsa

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Madres Unidas.

En este lugar vive la señora Justina, tiene 62 años de edad,  está separada de su marido pero de esa relación tiene una hija mayor de edad e independiente, con ella vive una nieta que tiene 15 años la cual estudia en el colegio.
 
Doña Justina es una mujer muy luchadora que sola sale adelante, ella  se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando quieren una prenda. Trabaja todos los días ya que así se entretiene, ella deja a crédito  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería la compra  en Guayaquil cada vez  que necesita. Gracias a su negocio ella pude solventar sus gastos de una forma honesta y honrada.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva 7 años en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan para salir adelante.
 
Su sueño es tener salud para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
In Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its great diversity in traditional products (e.g. straw hats known both throughout Ecuador and abroad), the members of the Banco Comunal Madres Unidas (communal bank) meet every two weeks.

Justina lives in this city. She is 62 years old and is separated from her husband. She has an adult daughter who is self-reliant. Justina lives with her 15 year old grand-daughter, who studies at the local high school.
 
Doña Justina is a determined woman who is always seeking to get ahead. She sells all kinds of clothing door-to-door as well as out of her house,  where her clients visit her when they want to buy a new garment. She works every day and enjoys it. She extends lines of credit, for which she seeks repayment every two weeks. She purchases her merchandise in Guayaquil as needed. Because of her business, she is able to cover her expenses in an honest and honorable manner.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as trousers, shirts, t-shirts and children's clothing. She has been a member of the communal bank for 7 years and likes it because it has helped her to get ahead. 
 
Her dream is to remain healthy in order keep moving forward.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, t-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en:
Sophal is 51 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been selling rope for more than three years, earning approximately 3 USD daily. Sophal's husband runs a cattle business and earns about 5 USD per day. Three of her children are employed. They make an income of 10 USD each day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sophal is requesting a 400 USD loan to purchase a stud bull to run their crossbreed service. Her loan will help to generate more income to support her family. In the future, Sophal would like to add more capital to expand her business and help her youngest child earn a bachelors degree.

loans.use: to purchase a stud bull to run her crossbreed service

loans.name: Marline Jazmin

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Liberación Femenina se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Marline, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 12 y 4 años, el mayor estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca. 

Doña Marline es una gran ama de casa que realiza el crédito para que su esposo tenga los recursos necesarios para poder realizar su trabajo, él se dedica a la pesca para lo cual junto a otras personas se van a alta mar  en su pequeña embarcación a realizar sus faenas de pesca, ellos salen en la tarde y llegan después de tres días con los productos que el mar les da, una vez en la playa entregan los productos a comerciantes mayoristas para que estos los distribuyan en toda la provincia.  Su marido realiza esto desde muy joven y es la forma como él gana lo necesario para salir adelante, con el trabajan tres personas más a quienes les paga un sueldo por su trabajo.

Este crédito es para comprar redes, piolas, combustibles y alimentos para los días que tienen que estar en alta mar. Lleva tres años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la unión que hay en el grupo. 

Su sueño es tener un gran barco para que su esposo realice sus faenas de pesca.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Liberación Femenina meets every other week in Puerto López, a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and tourist attractions. Every year the humpback whales arrive to mate, an event that attracts many tourists at this time of year. Here is where Marline lives. She a 27-year old woman, married and mother of two children aged 12 and 4. Her older son attend school and her husband works in fishing. 

Marline is a great housewife and is requesting a loan so that her husband can have the necessary resources to work. He works in fishing and takes a small boat offshore together with other colleagues. They leave in the evening and come back after three days with the products that the sea has provided. Then they give them to the wholesalers so that they can distribute them throughout the province. Her husband has been in this profession since he was very young and this is how he earns a living. He has three people working for him and to whom he pays a salary. He will use this loan to buy nets, strings, fuel and food for when they are offshore. 

She has been with the Communal Bank for three years and likes it because its members are very united. Her dream is to have a big boat for his husband.

loans.use: to buy nets, strings, fuel and food.

loans.name: Mercedes Lucia

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Liberación Femenina se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, donde todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Mercedes, tiene 23 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre pero aun no tiene hijos. El marido es artesano y mecánico. 

Doña Mercedes con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos se dedica a la venta de ropa por catálogo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, para lo cual ella lleva su revista para enseñar sus productos y sus clientes pueden elegir la prenda que les guste, ella realiza los pedidos y entrega las prendas.  Trabaja todos los días, deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Lleva dos años dedicada a esta actividad la cual le deja muy buenos ingresos.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace tres ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan en el banco. 

Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que donde vive es arrendado.
texts.en:
The Liberación Femenina communal bank meets every two weeks in Puerto López. It is a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions. Every year, the humpbacked whales appear there, an event that attracts a lot of tourists to the beach.

Here lives Mercedes. She is 23 years old and is in a common law marriage but has no children yet. Her husband is an artisan and a mechanic.  

To have her own income, Mercedes sells clothing via catalog. She does this door to door, bringing her catalog to show her products so her customers can choose the clothing that they like. She makes the orders and delivers the clothing. She works every day and collects every two weeks. She has been doing this activity for years and is brings in good income.

She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise such as: pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothing. She has been in the communal bank for three cycles and she likes it because of the help the bank offers.  

Her dream is to own her own home, since the one she lives in is rented.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Munkhnairamdal

texts.en:
Munkhnairamdal, 43 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. Since 2007, Munkhnairamdal has been working as a manager at a private business. His son studies at university. Recently, Munkhnairamdal decided to begin a transportation business using his own truck. His truck has ten tires which have deteriorated over the years. 

Munkhnairamdal is requesting a 4,000,000 MNT loan to purchase new tires from China. After changing the old tires with new ones, he will be able to use his truck to transport heavy-weight goods. His business has no risk of failure because heavy-weight trucks are in great demand by building companies. Munkhnairamdal's loan will certainly improve his living standards. He is a very hardworking individual who strives for better future.

loans.use: to purchase ten new truck tires

loans.name: Thea

texts.en:
Thea is 41 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than a year, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Thea's husband runs a business purchasing junk materials to resell. He makes an income of 4 USD daily. In addition, the couple are rice farmers. One of Thea's children is employed in a garment factory and earns about 4 USD each day. 

In order to improve her faming business, Thea is requesting a 1,000 USD loan to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farmland. Her loan will help reduce her farming expenses. In the future, Thea would like to expand her business and help her children earn a higher education. She also plans to build a new house next year.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to till her farmland

loans.name: Ángela Palmira

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 24 De Noviembre se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Machalilla en el cantón Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos como el Parque Nacional Machalilla el cual ofrece muchos atractivos de los restos de la cultura ancestral, este lugar es muy visitado en toda época del año.
  
Aquí vive la señora Ángela, tiene 66 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 4 hijos mayores de edad, con ellos vive una de sus hijas la cual es discapacitada. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
  
Doña Ángela para poder ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, uniformes de escualas, helados y gelatinas que ella mismo prepara, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa,  ella vende la ropa a crédito y cobra cada 8 días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil de acuerdo a lo que necesite. Lleva varios años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, uniformes y ropa interior para niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos.
 
Su sueño es seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The 24 De Noviembre communal bank meets every fortnight in the Machalilla parish in the Puerto López canton, an area surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions such as the Machalilla national park which has a lot of attractions in the form of remains of ancestral cultures. This area is well frequented throughout the year.
  
This is where Ángela lives, she is 66 years old, is married and, from this relationship she has 4 adult children. They live with one of their daughters who is disabled. Her husband makes his living in the fishing industry.
 
To earn a bit of money by herself and help her husband with the household costs, Ángela makes her living selling all types of clothes, school uniform, ice cream and jelly which she prepares herself. She sells from door to door and also sells from her home. She sells clothes on credit and collects every 8 days. She buys her merchandise from Guayaquil in accordance with what she needs. She has spent several years working in this field and it is going very well for her.

Ángela will use this credit to buy clothes, uniforms and underwear for children. She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and likes it for the help that these loans give. 

Her dream is to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy clothes, uniform and underwear for children.

loans.name: Johanna Jahary

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Liberación Femenina se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Johanna, tiene 32 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  13 y 10 años que estudian en escuela, ella vive en la casa de los padres. Ella es Ingeniera en ecoturismo.

Doña Johanna para salir adelante ya que ella es padre y madre a la vez se dedica a la venta de productos de una marca Norteamericana llamada Laudine, entre los productos que vende están lociones, cremas, shampoo, etc. Los productos son muy buenos razón por la cual cuenta con muy buena clientela que siempre le piden sus productos los mismos que deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días  dependiendo de la capacidad de pago de sus clientes, ella lleva más de 1 año con este negocio el cual le permite ganarse algo para sacar adelante a sus hijos.

Este crédito es para comprar cremas, lociones, shampoo, etc. para la venta. Lleva tres años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. 

Su sueño es tener un trabajo de acuerdo a su profesión.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Liberación Femenina meets every other week in Puerto López, a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and tourist attractions. Every year the humpback whales arrive to mate, an event that attracts many tourists at this time of year. Here is where Johanna lives. She is a 32-year old woman, separated and mother of two children, aged 13 and 10, who attend school. They live with her parents and she is an engineer of ecotourism. 

Johanna is mother and father at the same time and works in retail to get ahead. She sells the products of a North American brand called Laudine, including lotions, creams, shampoo, etc., and has a good clientele. She offers credit and gets paid in 8 days, depending on the payment capacity of her clients. She has had this business for one year and is earning a living for her family. 

She will use this loan to buy creams, lotions, shampoo, etc. for sale. She has been with the Communal Bank for three years and likes it for the help that the loans provide. Her dream is to have a job in her profession.

loans.use: to buy creams, lotions, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is married with two children. For the last 15 years, she has been selling provisions at Ve-Agbome, Hohoe. Lydia received an education, but only through middle school, and she worked to support herself and her younger siblings before getting married. Lydia helps her husband provide for the basic needs of their home. 

Lydia is requesting a loan to buy cartons of assorted soap, bag of rice, biscuits, and different types of tin fish, sugar, and candies. She hopes to use the profits from her loan to put toward her old age and her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy soap, rice, biscuits, and different types of tin fish, sugar, and candies

loans.name: Leng

texts.en:
Leng is 45 years old. She is married and resides with seven children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for more than three years, earning approximately 5 USD daily. Leng's husband works repairing sewing machines and makes 5 USD per day. Two of her children are employed in a factory and earn about 6 USD each day. 

Due to a lack of funds, Leng is requesting a 1,500 USD loan to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house. Her loan will help her to provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, Leng would like to expand her store and help her children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house

loans.name: Felicita Yolanda

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Ruta Del Sol se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse y esto es un acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Felicita, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 7 y 4 años, su hija mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa.

Doña Felicita para tener sus propios ingresos tiene un pequeño bazar en su casa en el cual vende ropa, zapatos, bisutería y muchos otros productos, ella también con su papá también tienen una tienda de víveres en la cual venden de todo para satisfacer a sus clientes. Trabaja todos los días en ambos negocios dependiendo de lo lleno que este mas que todo en la tienda que hay días y horas que llegan muchas personas y su papá no se alcanza atender a todos. Tienen más de 10 años con sus negocios los cuales le permite salir adelante.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar víveres para su tienda y artículos de bazar. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 10 años y le gusta porque gracias al primer crédito empezó su negocio.
 
Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
The Ruta Del Sol communal bank meets every two weeks in Puerto López. It is a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions. Every year, the humpback whales appear and this is an event that attracts many tourists at that time of the year. 

Here lives Felicita. She is 37 years old, married and has two children, aged 7 and 4. Her oldest daughter is in school. Her husband works at a business.  

To have her own income,Felicita has a small variety store in her house where she sells clothes, shoes, jewelry, and many other products. With her father, she also has a little grocery store where they sell everything to satisfy their customers. She works every day in both businesses, depending on how full the grocery store is, especially. There are days when a lot of people go there and her father can't attend to everyone. She has had her businesses for more than 10 years and they allow her to get ahead. 

She is going to use this loan to buy grocery and miscellaneous items. She has been in the communal bank for 10 years and she likes it because it was thanks to the first loan that she started her business.
 
Her dream is to give her little ones the best.

loans.use: to buy grocery and miscellaneous items.

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Mini Bankito se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café, por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.
 
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos  de 17, 14 y 11 años que estudian en el colegio. Su esposo es maestro.

Doña, María es una muy buena ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas. Donde ella se va siempre lleva su revista, la misma que enseña a sus clientes para que le realicen los pedidos. Ella también trabaja en un jardín de infantes que es de su hermana y por lo cual recibe un sueldo mensual. Lleva más de 8 años dedicada al comercio  y le va bastante bien, con lo que gana ella cubre los gastos de  los estudios de sus hijos ya que son muy grandes.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas y cosméticos. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. 

Su sueño es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The “Mini Bankito” communal bank meets every two weeks in Jipijapa Canton, a canton known as “La Sultana del Café” because of its extensive fields of incomparably flavored coffee, its cuisine and for the warm-heartedness of its people.

This is where María lives. She is 43 years old, married and has three children aged 11, 14 and 17, who study at the local high school. Her husband is a teacher.

Doña María is a very good housewife; in order to earn her own money and help her husband pay for household expenses, she sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). She carries her Avon catalog with her wherever she goes and shows it to her clients so that they can place orders with her. She also works at her sister's nursery school and receives a monthly salary there. She has been in business for 8 years and it is going fairly well. She uses the money she earns to pay for her growing children's schooling.

This loan will be used to buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics. María has been a part of the communal bank since its inception. She likes it because it helps her get loans. 

Her dream is to have her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is married and has two children. For the past five years, she has sold utensils at Ve-Agbome, Hohoe. Anastacia received schooling through junior high school. Her husband is a carpenter and Anastacia is responsible for providing food for her family and helping to buy books for her children's education. 

Anastacia is requesting a loan to purchase different sizes and types of utensils. With the profits from her loan, Anastacia plans to save to increase her working capital and promote her business.

loans.use: to purchase different sizes and types of utensils

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy clothes for her clothes-selling business.

loans.name: Mandakh's Buleg Group

texts.en:
Mandakh is a 57-year-old married woman who has two children who are 24 and 28 years old. Her family lives in their own 'ger', a traditional Mongolian felt tent, which is located in the outer 'ger' district of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. 

She has been supporting her family by operating a felt manufacturing business since 2004. She usually sews felt sandals and souvenirs and sells them at a local indoor market. During the summertime there are many tourists in Mongolia and they are really overjoyed to buy traditional felt souvenirs and sandals. 

Mandakh wants to expand her business in order to increase her working capital during the tourist season in Mongolia. So she is requesting a 1,000,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to purchase raw materials to make more products.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to make felt products.

loans.name: Natpheu

texts.en: Natpheu is 27 years old. She is married and lives with her husband in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than three years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is employed in a rice mill. He earns about $5 daily. Due to lack of funds, Natpheu is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase timbers to build her house’s wall. This purchase will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store and build a fence around her house.

loans.use: to purchase timbers to build her house's wall.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua is a widow and has 3 children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Efua is a successful businesswoman. She sells charcoal in Wiomoah (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about 5 years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Efua uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

She will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of charcoal, thus helping her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Efua plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of charcoal.

loans.name: Lucia Rocio

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 24 De Noviembre se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Machalilla en el cantón Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos como el Parque Nacional Machalilla el cual ofrece muchos atractivos de los restos de la cultura ancestral, este lugar es muy visitado en toda época del año.  

Aquí vive la señora Lucia, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijas, tres mayores de edad y dos de 17 y 7 años  que estudian en colegio y escuela.  Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Doña Lucia es una muy buena esposa y madre que le gusta ganar sus propios recursos y con esto ayudar a mantener el hogar, ella tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa  en la cual vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, entre otras cosas, allí trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijas le ayudan cuando están desocupadas y si no ella se vale por si sola para atender a sus clientes. Tiene más de 4 años con su negocio lo cual le ha servido para ayudar a sus hijas con los gastos de sus estudios.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 años  y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. 

Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The 24 De Noviembre communal bank meets every fortnight in the Machalilla parish in the Puerto López canton, an area surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions such as the Machalilla national park which has a lot of attractions in the form of remains of ancestral cultures. This area is well frequented throughout the year.
  The 24 de Noviembre communal bank meets every fortnight in the Machalilla parish in the Puerto López canton, an area surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions such as the Machalilla national park which has a lot of attractions in the form of remains of ancestral cultures. This area is well frequented throughout the year.

This is where Lucia lives, she is 40 years old, she is married and from this relationship she has five daughters, three who are adults and two aged 7 and 17 years old who are studying at school and high school. Her husband makes his living fishing.

Lucia is a very good wife and mother and likes earning her own money with which she help with the upkeep of the household. She runs a grocery store in her home where she sells as kinds of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergents and other items. She works every day from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm and sometimes even later. Her daughters help her when they are not busy, otherwise, Lucia is more than capable of attending to her customers alone. She has spent more than four years in the business which has enabled her to help her daughters with their schooling fees.

Lucia will use this loan to stock more goods in her store, she will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, tinned goods and other basic commodities. She has been in the communal bank for five years and she likes it because it was with one of the loans that she started the business.

Her goals are to continue forging ahead in the business and that the store grows every day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil; detergents, tinned goods and other basic items.

loans.name: Faustine

texts.en:
Faustine is married with four children. For the past seven years she has worked as a trader, selling food, drinks, and merchandise at Ve-Agbome, Hohoe. Because of financial constraints, Faustine received education only through junior high school, and decided to join one of her aunties to learn trading.  Faustine's husband operates a drinking spot. She assists her husband in providing for the home and providing clothing for her family.

Faustine is requesting a loan to buy tomatoes, fried fish, and crates of eggs. She hopes to save and use the new profits from her loan to increase her profit margin.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, fried fish, and crates of eggs

loans.name: Doris

texts.en:
Doris is married and has six children. For the past seven years, she has sold charcoal at Ve-Agbome, Hohoe. Doris received schooling through junior high school. Her husband is a local lotto agent. Doris uses her income to help out with the basic needs of her home. 

Doris is requesting a loan to purchase to bags of charcoal. She is keen on enhancing her sales and expanding her business. She plans to use the profits from her loan to introduce the sale of ladies sandals.

loans.use: to purchase to bags of charcoal

loans.name: Arevik

texts.en:
Arevik has been involved in land cultivation for 10 years. She cultivates tomatoes and grows apricot, apple and pear trees with great love and pleasure. She sells the gathered harvest locally and gets income that is vital for sustaining her family of 5: Arevik herself, her husband, son, daughter-in-law and little grandchild.

Arevik works hard to get income, because agriculture is the only source of income for her family. The income she gets is hardly enough for covering basic costs and there is no money left for enlarging the farm. So, Arevik has applied for this loan to purchase fertilizer and seeds, which are very important for successful cultivation of the land.

The loan will help Arevik to increase the variety of trees that she grows and gather more harvest. She dreams of having a stable income and ensuring a better and secure life for her family.

loans.use: to pay for seeds and fertilizer for land cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Even though Nana grew up in poverty without an education, this has not stopped her from fulfilling her dream of achieving a better life for her and her family. Currently, Nana is an entrepreneur. She sells doughnuts in Wiomoah (near Cape Coast). Her business enterprise has grown substantially since she began 10 years ago. 

She uses the income from her business to help her husband raise their 6 children. Nana has identified that there are growing demands among consumers for her product. Nevertheless she is unable to meet their needs due to limited inventory capacity. 

Thus she aims to use her loan to purchase more flour, sugar, and cooking oil. With the new profits from her expanded business, Nana wants to buck the trend by ensuring that all her children will be given the opportunity to further distance their family from poverty.

loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of phone credit cards.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua is married with eight children. Although she has received no prior formal education, she is an entrepreneur who sells cassava and plantain in Wafkrom, near Cape Coast. Efua has been running her business for two years. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her business normally go toward helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. 

Efua is requesting a loan to buy cassava and plantain to increase her current inventory and sell greater quantities of cassava and plantain. In the long term, Efua plans to reinvest future her profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet rising customer demand.

loans.use: to buy cassava and plantain to sell

loans.name: Nieve Margarita

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Ruta Del Sol se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse y esto es un acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Nieve, tiene 50 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos mayores de edad, con ellos vive una hija que es madre soltera y vive con su pequeña. Su esposo se dedica al comercio. 

Doña Nieve y su esposo tienen una tienda de víveres en su casa muy bien surtida, venden toda clase de víveres y productos de bazar. Allí mismo y en las mañanas se dedican a la venta de ceviches de pescado con lo cual les quedan ingresos muy buenos. Trabajan todos los días y tienen más de 15 años con su negocio el cual les permite salir adelante.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar víveres para su tienda y pescado para los ceviches. Lleva 8 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los  créditos son rápidos y le brindan mucha ayuda.
 
Su sueño es aumentar más su negocio.
texts.en:
The Ruta Del Sol communal bank meets every two weeks in Puerto López. It is a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions. Every year the humpbacked whales appear, an event that attracts many tourists at that time of year. 

Here lives Nieve. She is 50 years old, married, and has four grown children. A daughter who is a single mother lives with them with her little girl. Her husband is a merchant.  

Nieve and her husband have a well stocked small grocery store. The sell every type of groceries and miscellaneous products. There they sell fish ceviche in the morning, which brings in good income. They work every day and have had the business for more than 15 years. It allows them to get ahead. 

She is going to use this loan to buy grocery items for her store and fish for the ceviche. She has been in the communal bank for more than 8 years and she likes it because the loans are quick and they offer a lot of help.
 
Her dream is to grow her business more.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and fish.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances Ama did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Ama sells charcoal in Wiomoah (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about 3 years. She is married to a farmer, and together they have 2 children. She uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. 

Ama will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of charcoal, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. She wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of charcoal, which will aid her in improving her overall sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of plastic bowls, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Juana Mariela

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Ruta Del Sol se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse y esto es un acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Juana, tiene 25 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 8 y 3 años, el mayor estudia en escuela. El marido es albañil. 

Doña Juana para salir adelante con su familia y al ver que su esposo en ciertas ocasiones no tiene trabajo hace 8 meses empezó un negocio de venta de comida, tiene un comedor cerca del mercado de la ciudad en el cual vende deliciosos platos, ella varia el menú con la intención de que sus clientes se sientan a gusto con los paltos que ella prepara, trabaja desde las 5h00 hasta las 15h00 porque solo prepara desayunos y almuerzos ya que en la tarde ella tiene que ayudar y atender a sus hijos. Gracias a su negocio están saliendo adelante porque actualmente su esposo está sin trabajo.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 3 ciclos y le gusta porque gracias al crédito empezó su negocio.

Su sueño es mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Ruta Del Sol meets every other week in Puerto López, a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and tourist attractions. Every year the humpback whales arrive to mate, an event that attracts many tourists at this time of the year. Here is where Juana lives. She is a 25-year old woman who lives with her partner and has two children aged 8 and 3. Her older child attends school and her husband is a builder. 

To get ahead and seeing that sometimes her husband does not have work, Juana started her business 8 months ago. She has a dining near the town market and sells delicious dishes. She offers a varied menu so that her clients are satisfied, and works from 5am to 3pm serving breakfasts and lunches. In the evening she takes care of the children. Her husband is currently unemployed and thanks to her business they are getting ahead. 

She will use this loan to buy rice, meat, fish and other food supplies to prepare the dishes. She has been with the Communal Bank for 3 cycles and she likes it because she could start her business thanks to a loan. Her dream is to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, fish and other food supplies.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Although she has received no prior formal education, Adjoa is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling charcoal in Wiomoah (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 20 years. Adjoa is married and has five children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. Adjoa will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of charcoal, thus helping her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Adjoa plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of charcoal, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales

loans.name: Nery Marcela

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Ruta Del Sol se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse y esto es un acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Nery, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 16, 13 y 12 años que estudian en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.

Doña Nery para tener sus propios ingresos para los gastos de sus estudios de sus hijos se dedica a la venta de ropa por catálogo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y trabaja todos los días, deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Ella lleva tres años dedicada a esta actividad la cual le deja muy buenos ingresos.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 7 años  y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan en el banco.
 
Su sueño es que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The communal bank Ruta Del Sol meets every other week in Puerto López, an area surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions. Each year, hunchback whales appear, an event that attracts many tourists during that season.

This is where Nery lives. She is 33 years old and married with three children ages 16, 13, and 12. They are all currently studying and Nery's husband is a businessman. In order to help pay for her children's education and generate her own income, Nery began selling clothing through catalogs. She goes door to door every day selling clothing. She allows her customers to pay through credit so she collects payments every week. Nery has been working in this business for three years. It has been very successful for her. 

Nery will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothing. Nery has been a member of the communal bank for seven years. She really enjoys the support the bank provides her. Nery's dream is to see her children finish their studies and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothing.

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal 24 De Noviembre se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Machalilla en el cantón Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos como el Parque Nacional Machalilla el cual ofrece muchos atractivos de los restos de la cultura ancestral, este lugar es muy visitado en toda época del año. 
 
Aquí vive la señorita María, tiene 26 años de edad, está soltera y vive con la mamá. Lleva dos años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado con los créditos.
 
María es una joven muy trabajadora que le gusta salir adelante gracias al trabajo honrado y con esto ayudar a su mamá con los gastos del hogar, ella trabaja en un guardería que hay en el lugar ya que le encantan los niños, pero también junto a su mamá tiene un local de venta de repuestos y refacciones de motores fuera de borda los cuales son utilizados por los pescadores del lugar, sus ventas son muy buenas ya que son pocos los lugares que se dedican a la venta de estos repuestos en la zona y a ellas les gusta tener de todo para que sus clientes encuentre lo que necesitan en su local, tienen más de 4 años con este negocio el cual les deja muy buenas ganancias.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar repuestos de motores y aceites que venden en su local.
 
Su sueño es seguir mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
The 24 De Noviembre communal bank meets every fortnight in the Machalilla parish in the Puerto López canton, an area surrounded by beautiful beaches and many tourist attractions such as the Machalilla national park which has a lot of attractions in the form of remains of ancestral cultures. This area is well frequented throughout the year.
 
This is where María lives, she is 26 years old, she is single and lives with her mother. She has been with the communal bank for two years and likes it due to the help given with the loan.
 
María is a very hardworking young lady who enjoys getting ahead in life thanks to the honorable work and with this, she will help her mother with the household costs. She works in a nursery in the area as she loves children, but she also runs a store with her mother selling motorbike tires and spare parts for outboard engines which are used by the fisherman in the area. Her sales are excellent as there are only a few places which make their living selling these spare parts in the area. These women lives to have everything in stock so that their customers find what they need in their store. They have spent more than 4 years in this business with which they earn healthy profits.

María will use this loan to buy spare engine parts and oils which they sell in their premises.
 
Her dream is to continue improving her business.

loans.use: to buy motorbike tires and oil.

loans.name: Melia

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Ruta Del Sol se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse y esto es un acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Melia, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos  mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca. 

Doña Melia es una gran ama de casa que realiza el crédito para que su esposo y sus hijos lo utilicen para su trabajo de pesca, ellos se van a alta mar en su pequeña embarcación a realizar sus faenas de pesca, salen en la tarde y no llegan sino hasta después de tres días con los productos que el mar les da, una vez en la playa entregan los productos a comerciantes mayoristas para que estos los distribuyan a toda la provincia. Su marido realiza esto desde muy joven y así mismo sus hijos también continúan con esta labor que les permite sacar adelante a sus familias.

Este crédito es para comprar redes, piolas, combustibles y alimentos para los días que tienen que estar en alta mar. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe del banco. 

Su sueño es tener un gran barco para que su esposo realice sus faenas de pesca.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Ruta Del Sol meets every other week in Puerto López, a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and tourist attractions. Every year the humpback whales arrive to mate, an event that attracts many tourists at this time of the year. Here is where Melia lives. She is a 52-year old woman, married and mother of two adult children, who are already independent. Her husband works in fishing. 

Melia is a great housewife and is requesting a loan so that her husband and sons can use it for their fishing work. They use a small boat and sail offshore to fish. They leave in the evening and come back after three days with the products that the sea has provided. Then they give them to the wholesalers so that they can distribute them throughout the province. Her husband has been in this profession since he was very young and so their children are following his path. This is how they get ahead and support their families. This loan will be used to buy nets, strings, fuel and food for when they are offshore. 

She has been with the Communal Bank since it started and she likes it for the support she receives. Her dream is to have a large boat for her husband.

loans.use: to buy nets, strings, fuel and food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of ingredients to make soap

loans.name: Efua Mensah

texts.en:
Although she grew up in difficult circumstances, Efua is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling ‘Kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian staple dish that is made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves). She makes the ‘Kenkey’ on her own and then sells it in Wiomoah, near Cape Coast. She has been doing this for 20 years. 

Efua is a widow, without any children. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her support herself and her extended family. Efua wants to use her loan to buy more maize, to help make more of her tasty ‘Kenkey’. In the future, Efua plans to reinvest her profits back into her business, to help her expand and meet rising customer demands.

loans.use: to buy more maize

loans.name: Sahr

texts.en:
Sahr is approximately 39 years old. He was born in Nimikoro. Sahr is married to a businesswoman and has five children, Three of his children are attending primary and secondary schools and the other two are not of school-going age. He sells cocoa, coffee, water in plastic, etc. and has been a businessman for 10 years now.  

Sahr has requested a loan of SLL 5,000,000 from Kiva field partner, Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), in order to expand his business. He will use the loan to buy cocoa, coffee, water, etc.,  wholesale, to add to his current stock. In this way, his business will improve both in size and quality, attracting many customers into his shop.

loans.use: to buy cocoa, coffee, water in plastic, etc., wholesale, to add to his current stock

loans.name: Mercedes Antonieta

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Ruta Del Sol se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse y esto es un acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora Mercedes, tiene 20 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 5 y 2 años y un bebé de 10 meses,  el mayor este año empieza la escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Doña Mercedes es una gran ama de casa que realiza el crédito para que su esposo lo utilice en su trabajo de pesca, él tiene un barco pesquero donde junto a otras 17 personas se  van a alta mar a realizar sus faenas de pesca, salen por una semana o quince días  y luego de este tiempo regresan con lo que hayan pescado para luego entregar los productos a comerciantes mayoristas que distribuyen en toda la provincia. Su marido se dedica esto desde muy joven ya que su padre hacia lo mismo por lo cual aprendió esta profesión la cual les permite salir adelante.

Este crédito es para comprar redes, piolas, combustibles y alimentos para los días que tienen que estar en alta mar. Lleva año y medio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ella puede ayudar a su esposo.

Sus sueños son que nunca les pase nada en alta mar  y darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Ruta Del Sol meets every other week in Puerto López, a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and tourist attractions. Every year the humpback whales arrive to mate, an event that attracts many tourists at this time of the year. Here is where Mercedes lives. She is 20-year old woman, married and mother of three children, aged 5, 2 and 10 months. Her older child is starting school this year and her husband works in fishing.  

Mercedes is a great housewife and is requesting a loan so that her husband can use it for his fishing work. He uses a small boat and sails offshore to fish with another 17 people. They leave for one or two weeks and come back with the products that the sea has provided. Then they give them to the wholesalers so that they can distribute them throughout the province. Her husband has been in this profession since he was very young following the steps of his father. This is how he gets ahead and supports his family. He will use this loan to buy nets, strings, fuel and food for when they are offshore. 

She has been with the Communal Bank for 1.5 years and likes it because she can help her husband thanks to the loans. Her dream is that nothing will ever happen when her husband is fishing offshore and to give a good education to her children.

loans.use: to buy nets, strings, fuel and food.

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Ruta Del Sol se reúne cada quince días en Puerto López, lugar rodeado de hermosas playas y de muchos atractivos turísticos, todos los años llegan las ballenas jorobadas a aparearse y esto es un acontecimiento que atrae a muchos turistas en esta época del año.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 24, 15 y 14 años, los dos menores estudian en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.

Doña María trabaja en una hostería de la ciudad y realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su marido en su negocio, él se dedica a la venta de pescado para lo cual casi todos los días en las mañanas se desplaza hasta la playa lugar donde llegan los pescadores, allí compra el pescado y luego lo revende a comerciantes de otras ciudades. Lleva más de 15 años con esta actividad con la cual ha sacado adelante a su familia.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pescado para la venta. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque así ella puede ayudar a su marido a salir adelante. 
 
Su sueño es darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Ruta Del Sol meets every other week in Puerto López, a place surrounded by beautiful beaches and tourist attractions. Every year the humpback whales arrive to mate, an event that attracts many tourists at this time of the year. Here is where María lives. She is a 43-year old woman, married and mother of three children, aged 24, 15 and 14. Her two youngest children attend school and her husband is a salesman. 

María works in an inn and is requesting a loan to help her husband in his business. He works selling fish and almost every day needs to go to the beach in the mornings where he buys the fish to the fishermen and resell to retailers in other towns. He has been in this profession for 15 years and is how he earns a living and supports his family. He will use this loan to buy fish for sale. 

She has been with the Communal Bank since it started and likes it because she can help her husband to get ahead. Her dream is to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of tomatoes.

loans.name: Comfort Esi

texts.en:
Comfort is a widow and has five children. After successfully graduating middle school, Comfort is now an established businesswoman. She sells coconut oil in Wiomoah (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about three years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Comfort uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Comfort will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of coconuts, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Comfort plans to diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of coconuts.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Although she has received no formal education, Ama is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling fish in Wiomoah (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 10 years.

 Ama is married and has four children. Her husband works as a mason. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Ama wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of fish. In the long term, Ama plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demand.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, allowing her to sell greater quantities of fish

loans.name: La Dolorosa Del Pueblito  (Montecristi) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal La Dolorosa del Pueblito se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

Este es un grupo de  12 mujeres y 2 hombres que decidieron unirse tiempo y formar este Banco Comunal que les ayudado de mucho ya que con los créditos ellos han podido mejorar sus pequeños negocios y su calidad de vida. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Katherine, tiene 20 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de 4 años, actualmente está en su octavo mes de embarazo de su segundo hijo. El marido trabaja en una fábrica.
